Classes

class  izenelib::util::ClockTimer
 A timer object similar to boost::timer but measures total elapsed time instead of CPU time. More...

Detailed Description

Timer using wall clock instead of CPU ticks.

Author:
Ian Yang
Date:
Created <2009-05-06 09:34:37>

Updated <2009-05-26 10:35:24> In some performance measurement, the total elapsed time is more important than just process or CPU time. izenelib::util::ClockTimer is such a tool recording the total elapsed time.

Because it use the Boost Date Time library, you may need to link that library.
